title: Naan
summary: Naan (Hindi: नान,Persian: نان‎, romanized: nān,  Punjabi: ਨਾਨ, Pashto : نان Dari: نان,Bengali: নান) is a leavened, oven-baked or tawa-fried flatbread[1] which is found in the cuisines mainly of Western Asia, Central Asia, Indian subcontinent, Indonesia, Myanmar and the Caribbean.[2][3][4]
